title: The Spinster's Secret
description: This spinster is more than she seems…Penniless Matilda Chapple is dependent on the austere charity of unloving relatives. Determined to earn her financial independence, she writes a series of erotic stories, purporting to be the confessions of a courtesan. Her secret is safe—until battle-scarred Waterloo veteran, Edward Kane, agrees to uncover the anonymous author’s identity.Can Mattie conceal the secret of her scandalous writings, or will Edward discover that the virginal spinster and the risqué authoress are one and the same person?
author: Emily Larkin
